list.title: module:FRjs/data
list.description: Data about Flight Rising's dragon attributes and breeding mechanics, and utility functions to streamline working with that data.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.areBreedsCompatible
list.description: Returns true if the two given breeds are compatible for breeding -- meaning either they're both modern breeds, or they're the same ancient breed -- and false if they aren't. If either parameter is not an index in {@link module:FRjs/data.BREEDS FRjs/data.BREEDS}, returns undefined.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.BREEDS
list.description: All available breeds, their rarities, and a type specifying if they're ancient or modern. Sorted by name (ascending). [Data Source]{@link https://www1.flightrising.com/wiki/wiki}

list.title: module:FRjs/data.BreedType
list.description: Enum for breed types; ie Ancient and Modern.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.calcRarityProb
list.description: Compares two objects with rarities from the given array, and returns the probability of the given target outcome occurring. If the indexes aren't in the array, or the array members don't have rarities, returnsundefined.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.colourRange
list.description: Yields all colours in the shortest range between the two given colours. If either parameter is not an index in {@link module:FRjs/data.COLOURS FRjs/data.COLOURS}, yields nothing.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.colourRangeLength
list.description: Calculates the length of the shortest range between two colours. If either parameter is not an index in {@link module:FRjs/data.COLOURS FRjs/data.COLOURS}, returns undefined.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.COLOURS
list.description: All available colours and their hex codes. Hex codes are NOT prefixed. Ordered as they are in-game. Should be treated as a circular array.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.EYES
list.description: All possible eye types and their probabilities of occurring. Sorted by probability (descending). [Data Source]{@link https://flightrising.fandom.com/wiki/Eye_Types#Odds}

list.title: module:FRjs/data.GENES
list.description:
All available genes, organized into primary, secondary, and tertiary slots. Each gene has a name, rarity, boolean indicating if it's available on modern breeds, and list of indices of ancient breeds it's available on (if any). Each slot is sorted by name (ascending). [Data Source]{@link https://www1.flightrising.com/forums/gde/3231610}

This object has three properties: primary, secondary, and tertiary. All three of these properties are arrays containing gene objects which have the following structure:

Property Type Description
name string Name of the gene
rarity {@link module:FRjs/data.Rarity} Rarity of the gene
modern boolean Whether or not the gene is available on modern breeds
ancient number[] List of ancient breeds (by index) gene is available on

list.title: module:FRjs/data.genesForBreed
list.description: Yields all genes available to a breed in a specific slot. If no breed id or an invalid breed id is provided, ignores restrictions and yields all genes for this slot. If the slot is invalid, yields nothing.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.isColourInRange
list.description: Returns true if the target colour is in the shortest range between two given colours, and false if it isn't. If any parameter is not an index in {@link module:FRjs/data.COLOURS FRjs/data.COLOURS}, returns undefined. Range includes both end colours.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.isColourSubrangeInRange
list.description: Returns true if the colour range from target1 to target2 is a sub-range of the colour range from one to two, and false if not. If any parameter is not an index in {@link module:FRjs/data.COLOURS FRjs/data.COLOURS}, returns undefined. Both ranges include both their end colours.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.nestSizesForBreeds
list.description: Returns an array containing possible nest sizes and their probabilities if dragons of the two given breeds are nested. If the given breeds are incompatible, or if either parameter is not an index in {@link module:FRjs/data.BREEDS FRjs/data.BREEDS}, returns undefined.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.Rarity
list.description: Enum for rarities. Every breed and gene has a rarity.

list.title: module:FRjs/data.rarityTableLookup
list.description: Given two rarities to compare, returns an array containing, in order, the probability that rarity1 occurs and the probability that rarity2 occurs. If invalid rarities are given, returns undefined.

list.title: module:FRjs/forms
list.description:
Defines extensions of the native HTML <select> element which self-populate with different kinds of Flight Rising data. Available elements are registered as fr-eyes, fr-colours, fr-breeds, and fr-genes. See the tutorials for usage.

Customized Built-in Elements are not natively supported in Safari, but the custom dropdowns should work in Safari anyway because the module loads a polyfill if CBIE support is not detected.

list.title: module:FRjs/forms~PubSub#checkMessage
list.description: Check the last message sent to a given channel.

list.title: module:FRjs/forms~PubSub#sendMessage
list.description: Send a message to everyone subscribed to the given channel.

list.title: module:FRjs/forms~PubSub#subscribe
list.description: Subscribe to messages sent to a specific channel, and also receive the last message sent to the channel if there is one.
